attributes.action: remember and uphold the the tradition that governments are elected to serve the people and not the other way round.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more this government is interfering in the day-to-day running of people's personal lives.
Much of this interference is as a result of either a "nanny state" mentality or as a reason to further the government coffers at the public's expense.
As such The government should take head of the unrest felt in this country as witnessed by the proliferation of E-petitions

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
